    What is Amazon Renewed?

    Amazon Renewed is your trusted destination for products that are inspected, tested, and refurbished as necessary to be fully functional.

    Quality you can afford

    Amazon Renewed products offer an affordable option so you can save on the brands you love.

    Products you can trust

    All products have been professionally inspected, tested, cleaned, and refurbished as necessary by Amazon-qualified suppliers.

    Purchases with an impact

    Your Amazon Renewed purchase extends the lifetime of this product and reduces electronic waste.

    Trusted coverage

    Your purchase is eligible for Amazon Renewed coverage in conjunction with Amazon's Return Policy and the A-to-z Guarantee.

    What should I expect to receive with my Amazon Renewed purchase?

    All Amazon Renewed purchases will come with accessories equivalent to those that shipped in the box when new. These items may not be original but will be compatible and fully functional. Amazon Renewed products will be packaged in either original packaging or in a new and clean cardboard box.

    In what condition can I expect my Amazon Renewed product to be?

    Product will be restored to its original factory settings and will be in one of the following cosmetic conditions Premium, Excellent, Good or Acceptable. Learn more

    Product Description

    Audio-Technica's rigorous standards for quality and consistency set the AT2020 apart. Its low-mass diaphragm is custom designed to have an extended frequency response and excellent transient response. Built with rugged construction for long-lasting performance, this microphone offers a wide dynamic range and handles high SPLs with ease. AT2020: The new standard in affordable side-firing studio condensers.

    How customer reviews and ratings work

    Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

    To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we dont use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.

      Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2018
      Verified Purchase
      Definitely the best budget mic out there ( I say budget because this is no where near the price/quality of studio grade mics). The mic itself has some weight to it and is very well built and sturdy. From what I got, buying the mic in Certified Refurbished condition is no different to a brand new one.. This mic is very good for vocals if your into that and is very clear... I do recommend a pop filter of some sort for the mic if you are planning to do any vocals for music. I have also seen that using acoustic guitars or any other instruments get picked up by the mic very well... To answer the question you guys had, YES it is XLR and not USB.... if you do receive a usb or a damaged product, you can return it to amazon without paying for labels. Overall the Mic is really good for everything really... Definetley the best mic for its price.. only downside is since its certified refurbished (if you even get that it in CR) you have a chance of around maybe 12% of getting a damaged/wrong item... but it wont really affect anything because u can always return it and reorder it without spending more, only thing costing you is time.

      10/10 mic would buy it again

    • Sly Nation
      5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up with a clean look and fantastic recording quality.
      Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2018
      Verified Purchase
      I am a gaming Youtuber and ive been lucky enough to be fairly successful. I first started off with nothing more than a headset mic to record off of. I then upgraded to one of those cheap CAD usb mics and then I bought this on sale. I cannot understate how important good sound quality is. It doesn't matter if you are a youtuber, blogger/vlogger, webcam diva, or podcast host, the way you sound matters and this microphone has served me very well. Excellent recording quality in a wide range of voices or noises. Background noise is non existent, but it does need a pop filter as it picks up your T's P's and sometimes F's petty heavily. A cheap pop filter takes care of the problem. I have tried CADu37 mics and a few blue yeti's in the past and they cannot hold a candle to the sound quality you get from Audio Technica. It does need a phantom power supply, but I think that's part of the reason why it sounds so much better than USB powered mics. If you are thinking of getting this, I promise you that anything else in this price range wont sound as good.

    • David
      5.0 out of 5 stars I Did NOT See THAT Coming
      Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2019
      Verified Purchase
      So, I've been doing a podcast for four years, and I've been using a slowly escalating in quality series of mics to record. I started out with a cheap USB Mic, went to a Blue Yeti USB and then to a XLR Condenser mic with a mixing board. My mic wasn't great but I figured it was fine, until I decided to buy this based on needed a new mic due to series of unfortunate events and a LOT of great reviews. Today it arrived and I plugged it into my board and recorded a sample and holy HELL the difference! The signal off the mic is clean, the low end was pleasantly rumbly , the high end was crisp and the levels on the mic blew the old one away. I used to process my show in post to correct a lot of blown out sections, yet when I record with THIS mic, they are fine, and god knows my voice isn't getting better. This mic is worth WAY more than what I paid for it...and should tide me over until I finally break down and let gear envy lead me to a Shure SM 7B because they are the mic professionals use, even though I am not anywhere close to a professional.
